```{r}
library('cluster')
library('factoextra')
library('tidyverse')
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv('enh_impute.csv')
head(df)
```

```{r}
df$X1 <- NULL
head(df)
```

```{r}
for(i in colnames(df)){
  if ( typeof(df[[i]]) == 'integer'){
    df[[i]] <- as.factor(df[[i]])
  }
}
```

```{r}
#13 28 49 54 55 56
df$computador <- as.factor(df$computador)
df$internet <- as.factor(df$internet)
df$uso_compar <- as.factor(df$uso_compar)
df$celular <- as.factor(df$celular)
df$tel_fijo <- as.factor(df$tel_fijo)
df$tv_paga <- as.factor(df$tv_paga)
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```



```{r}
gower_dist <- daisy(df, metric = "gower")
```

```{r}
gower_mat <- as.matrix(gower_dist)
```
